scripts.test:ci: yarn --cwd functions lint && yarn --cwd functions build && firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage 'yarn --cwd functions test && flutter test --coverage'
scripts.test:functions: yarn --cwd functions lint && yarn --cwd functions build && firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage 'yarn --cwd functions test'
